content: @Yijie Hong @Dennis Ai welcome! Can you give us a quick sense of your goals for testing this week? Have you had a chance to look through the spec and sample data from the endpoints already online?
For visibility, I heard back from the Google team directly and they are following along but not yet able to participate publicly. I will act as as a bridge where I can. (FYI @Henry Wei)
We may wish to encourage new Zulip users to enable email notifications for direct mentions (if itâ€™s not already default-set).
